issue.title: [CF 884] Power check for a different spell
issue.body:
I'd like my icon for Taste for Blood to have a power check like an Overpower cooldown icon would, but it doesn't seem to be currently possible.


> Posted by CurseForge user Halsey1006 | Imported from CurseForge issue #884 | Raw

comments.body:
Please do not ignore the default ticket template and the instructions that are provided in it. I need the export string of the icon you are looking to modify before I can do anything to help you.

Edited Nov 6, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
